title: urugaatha uLLam uNDO
sahitya:
urugaatha uLLam uNdO
uppiliyappaa unai ninainthu
[urugaatha]


anupallavi

maRavaadhu un pEraruLai
manadhinil kaNam maRavEnE
piRavaa varam aruLvaai
iniya thiruviNNagaraanE
 [urugaatha]

caraNam

Oyaadha thee vinaigaL ozhiththidum thirumaalE
Maayaadha bavak kadal meeLa aruL sei aiyyanE
ThEyaadha bhakthiyudan thooyanE un padham paNinthEn
Thaayaagith thanthaiyaagi dhaaraNiyaik 
Kaaththidum unai ninainthu     
 [urugaatha]
